Posts.Content: Nov 30, 2007 06:24AM - edited Nov 30, 2007 06:25AM by hlg2314 I had an ultrasound that did show whether it was a cyst or a lump.  I had a surgical lumpectomy, out patient and they put me in what they call "twilight" it is like you are sleeping but not completely under-i do not know the difference.  As for going to work-I sit at a desk on a computer all day and my surgeon said no.  I had it done on a Thurs. so I went back on Mon. But he said If I worked on Sat. I could have went back then. I hope I helped a little with your questions- Good Luck
